progression.title: Track your progress with
progression.title1: a smart system we developed for you
progression.description: To know what your level is when you take the official exam and also before, the system will calculate according to the tests you will take what your approximate level is and so if the level is not good you can continue to study and improve

study.title: Practice with thousands of mediation questions at the level of
study.description: We want you to come as prepared as possible for the exam, so all the questions without exception correspond exactly to the level in the test, so if you study

time.title: Manage your time in the best way possible
time.description: We know that many of you are busy people, that's why you can choose predefined learning times and thus you can learn in the best way

details.title: Almost there!
details.subtitle: We just need a few more details before we can start.

overAll.testInHand: Mediation tests in the palm of the hand
overAll.firstInstruction: The brokers' registrar exam lasts two hours and includes 25 American questions.
overAll.secondInstruction: Registration for the realtor's registrar test is done online through the government payment service - registration for the realtor's test.
overAll.thirdInstruction: Exam topics: contract law, real estate law, planning and construction law, real estate taxation law, the brokers' law, selected sections of the penal code, the consumer protection law, the sales law, the tenant protection law, the business licensing law, the Israel Land Law.
overAll.wannaTest: Are you sure you want to submit the quiz?
overAll.improveResult: To improve your results , set learning reminders !
overAll.setClock: Set the clock according to the times that are convenient for you and choose the days you want to study and our system will make sure to automatically remind you to practice in the application.
overAll.whenToStart: So, when do you want to start?
overAll.recommendSettings: We recommend setting a reminder to learn on a daily basis.
